snippet: Sarah Robles, an American weight lifter who became a crowd favorite at the 2012 Summer Games in London, received a two-year suspension after testing positive for a banned substance, Usada announced.
abstract: American Olympic weight lifter Sarah Robles receives two-year suspension after testing positive for banned substances.
lead_paragraph: Sarah Robles, an American weight lifter who became a crowd favorite at the 2012 Summer Games in London, received a two-year suspension after testing positive for a banned substance, Usada announced.
